entities.description: Indicates the status of handling an arrestee, e.g., referred or handled.
Represents the offense codes for the incidents.
Represents the frequency count of each disposition status.
Represents the count of valid cases for a particular disposition.
Represents the total count of cases.

relationships.description: Relates the arrestee under 18 to their disposition status.
Relates the disposition status to its frequency count.
Indicates the count of valid cases associated with a specific disposition.
Indicates the total number of cases reported in the survey.
Associates an offense code with an incident.
